warscrolls.name: Anointed Sentinels
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Crush the Unworthy
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit for each **daemonic power point** it has.

abilities.name: Zealous Counter-Attack
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Counter-charge’ command for this unit
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Ashen Elder
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Stoked Fanaticism
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point allocated to each friendly non‑**HOBGROT HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit each phase while it is wholly within 6" of this unit. Add 6" to the range of this ability for each **daemonic power point** this unit has.

abilities.name: Extract Power
abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective, a **Place of Power**, or a terrain feature and that objective, **Place of Power** or terrain feature has a friendly desolation token, give this unit 1 ritual point.

warscrolls.name: Bull Centaurs
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Crush the Unworthy
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit for each **daemonic power point** it has.

abilities.name: Bull-Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. Add the number of **daemonic power points** this unit has to each roll. For each 6+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Daemonsmith
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Molten Mending
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT WAR MACHINE** wholly within 6" of this unit to be the target. Add 6" to the range of this ability for each **daemonic power point** this unit has.
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3+X)** the target, where **X** is the number of **daemonic power points** this unit has.

warscrolls.name: Daemonsmith on Infernal Taurus
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, War Machine, Wizard (1), Fly, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Horns and Hooves** is 4.

abilities.name: Daemonic Resilience
abilities.effect:
Apply the effect below that corresponds with the number of **daemonic power points** (DPP) this unit has:

**DPP Effect**
**1 -** This unit has **WARD (6+)**.
**2 -** This unit has **WARD (5+)**.
**3 -** This unit has **WARD (4+)** against damage inflicted by **SPELLS, PRAYERS** and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**. Otherwise, it has **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Immolating Presence
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Unholy Stampede
abilities.effect:
While a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT CAVALRY** unit is wholly within 12" of this unit:

•  That unit can use a **RETREAT** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.
•  No mortal damage is inflicted on that unit by **RETREAT** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Deathshrieker Rocket Battery
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut

abilities.name: Hungering Flames
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the Damage characteristic of this unit's **Hashu-Zharr Rockets** is 5 if the target is a **MONSTER** or a **WAR MACHINE**.

abilities.name: Watch Them Burn
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a SHOOT ability for this unit and all of its attacks targeted the same enemy unit
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of **daemonic power points** this unit has for each other enemy unit within the combat range of the target of this unit's shooting attacks. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the enemy unit being rolled for.

warscrolls.name: Dominator Engine with Bane Maces
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Automaton

abilities.name: Engine of Domination
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat with any enemy **HEROES**, it can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the phase and can only be picked to use a second **FIGHT** ability if it is still in combat with any enemy **HEROES**.

abilities.name: Daemonic Strength
abilities.effect:
For each **daemonic power point** this unit has:
•  Add 1" to its Move characteristic.
•  Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its weapons.

warscrolls.name: Dominator Engine with Immolation Cannons
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Automaton

abilities.name: All Must Burn!
abilities.declare: Pick any number of visible enemy units within 8" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Immolation Cannons** for each unit picked to be the target of this ability, but each time this unit uses a **SHOOT** ability, it must target each of those units with at least 3 of its attacks.

abilities.name: Daemonic Strength
abilities.effect:
For each **daemonic power point** this unit has:
•  Add 1" to its Move characteristic.
•  Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its weapons.

warscrolls.name: Hobgrotz Vandalz
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Hobgrot

abilities.name: Disposable Lackeys
abilities.effect: This unit can immediately use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

warscrolls.name: Infernal Cohort with Hashutite Blades
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Daemonic Resilience
abilities.effect:
Apply the effect below that corresponds with the number of **daemonic power points** (DPP) this unit has:

**DPP Effect**
**1 -** This unit has **WARD (6+)**.
**2 -** This unit has **WARD (5+)**.
**3 -** This unit has **WARD (4+)** against damage inflicted by **SPELLS**, **PRAYERS** and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**. Otherwise, it has **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Disciplined March
abilities.effect: When making run rolls for this unit, if you roll a 1-3, you can use a value of 4 instead.

abilities.name: Sacred Gongs
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Gong Carriers** are tokens. There is 1 **Gong Carrier** for every **MUSICIAN** in this unit. If this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, as a reaction, you can remove a **Gong Carrier** to make an additional rally roll of D6.

warscrolls.name: Infernal Cohort with Hashutite Spears
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Daemonic Resilience
abilities.effect:
Apply the effect below that corresponds with the number of **daemonic power points** (DPP) this unit has:

**DPP Effect**
**1 -** This unit has **WARD (6+)**.
**2 -** This unit has **WARD (5+)**.
**3 -** This unit has **WARD (4+)** against damage inflicted by **SPELLS**, **PRAYERS** and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**. Otherwise, it has **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Sacred Gongs
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Gong Carriers** are tokens. There is 1 **Gong Carrier** for every **MUSICIAN** in this unit. If this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, as a reaction, you can remove a **Gong Carrier** to make an additional rally roll of D6.

abilities.name: Conquered Lands
abilities.declare: If this unit is contesting an objective you control, pick a friendly non-**HOBGROT HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, give the target 1 **daemonic power** point.

**Designer’s Note:** *You cannot make more than one roll for each objective in each turn regardless of how many friendly units with this ability are contesting that objective.*

warscrolls.name: Infernal Razers with Blunderbusses
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Hateful Hail
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit used a **SHOOT** ability this turn and all of its attacks targeted the same enemy unit, that enemy unit is the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice and add the number of enemy models in the target unit slain by attacks made by this unit this turn. If the result is 6+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Manglers of Metal
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s ranged weapons for each **daemonic power point** this unit has.

warscrolls.name: Infernal Razers with Flamehurlers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Scorched Remains
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit used a **SHOOT** ability this turn and all of its attacks targeted the same enemy **INFANTRY** unit, that enemy unit is the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract an amount equal to the roll from the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Manglers of Metal
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s ranged weapons for each **daemonic power point** this unit has.

warscrolls.name: The Blood of the Bull
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Infernal Empowerment
abilities.effect:
Apply the effect(s) below that correspond with the number of **daemonic power points** (DPP) this unit has. These effects are cumulative.
**DPP - Effect**
1+  Add 1" to this unit’s Move characteristic.
2+  Add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.
3  Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.

warscrolls.name: Tormentor Bombard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut

abilities.name: Calculated Trajectory
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks that target an enemy unit with 5 or more models that is more than 12" from this unit.

abilities.name: Ruinous Bombardment
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare:
If this unit used a **SHOOT** ability this turn and all of its attacks targeted the same enemy unit, that enemy unit is the target.

Then, you can pick a number of enemy units within 6" of the target equal to the number of **daemonic power points** this unit has to be additional targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, that unit cannot use commands until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Urak Taar, the First Daemonsmith
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, War Machine, Wizard (2), Fly, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Ghorrakos’s Horns and Hooves** is 4.

abilities.name: The Curse of Stone
abilities.declare: Pick a point on the battlefield within 9" of this unit, then pick a second point on the battlefield within 9" of the first point. Draw a line between the caster and the first point, and between the first and second points. Each enemy unit the lines pass across is a target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Pitiless Trampling
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, roll 2D6. This unit can move a distance up to the value of the roll. During that move, this unit can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Peerless Among Daemonsmiths
abilities.effect:
Apply the effect below that corresponds with the number of **daemonic power points** (DPP) this unit has:

**DPP - Effect**
**1 -** This unit has **WARD (6+)**.
**2 -** Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit. In addition, this unit has **WARD (5+)**.
**3 -** Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit. In addition, this unit has **WARD (4+)** against damage inflicted by **SPELLS, PRAYERS** and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**. Otherwise, it has **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Master of Daemonic Power
abilities.effect: Remove up to 3 **daemonic power points** in total from any combination of friendly units wholly within 18" of this unit. Then, allocate them to a different friendly non-**HOBGROT HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit wholly within 18" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: War Despot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Helsmiths of Hashut, Duardin

abilities.name: Black-hearted Conqueror
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 6" of this unit. Add 6" to the range of this ability for each **daemonic power point** this unit has.

abilities.name: 'Fight, You Scum!"
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO HELSMITHS OF HASHUT INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Arcane Dominance
rules.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls, unbinding rolls, banishment rolls and chanting rolls for friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT WIZARDS** and **PRIESTS** while they have 3 **daemonic power points**.

rules.name: Bulls of the Ziggurat
rules.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT CAVALRY** and **MONSTER** units while they have 3 **daemonic power points**.

rules.name: Amassed Legions
rules.effect: Each time a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT INFANTRY** unit with 3 **daemonic power points** uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

rules.name: Experimental Munitions
rules.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT WAR MACHINES** while they have 3 **daemonic power points**.

spells.name: Hateful Fractures
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Molten Metal
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified casting roll. Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each roll that equals or exceeds the target’s Save characteristic.

spells.name: Ashen Smog
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible terrain feature within 18" of them that has a friendly **desolation token** to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: That terrain feature has the ‘Obscuring’ ability (Terrain, 1.2) until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit contesting the target terrain feature. On a 2+, inflict an amount of damage equal to the roll on that unit.

spells.name: Black Flames of Hashut
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 4+ instead.

spells.name: Furnace Blessing
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 8+, that unit’s melee weapons also have **Crit (Mortal)** for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Storm of Obsidian Shards
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target and subtract 3 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

artefacts.name: Scroll of Petrification
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

•  The target has **WARD (2+)**.
•  The target cannot use non-passive abilities or be picked to be the target of friendly abilities.
•  Enemy units can ignore the target’s combat range for the purposes of movement and charging.
• Enemy units can ignore the target for the purposes of setting up on the battlefield but cannot be set up on the target.

artefacts.name: Crucible of Spite
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefacts.effect: Give up to 3 **daemonic power points** to this unit. However, you cannot allocate or give any more **daemonic power points** to this unit for the rest of the battle.

artefacts.name: Gauntlets of Punishment
artefacts.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: Talisman of Obsidian
artefacts.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

artefacts.name: Visage of the Great Bull
artefacts.effect: In your charge phase, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

heroicTraits.name: Servile Automaton
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT AUTOMATON** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect:
For the rest of the battle, the target is this unit’s bodyguard and the following effects apply:

•  While this unit is in combat and its bodyguard is within its combat range, its bodyguard has **STRIKE-FIRST**.
•  If this unit is **INFANTRY**, it has **WARD (5+)** while its bodyguard is within its combat range.

heroicTraits.name: 'Fire, You Worms!'
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT INFANTRY** unit that is not in combat and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: The target can immediately use the ‘Shoot’ ability as if it were your shooting phase. All attacks must target the same enemy unit, and the enemy unit picked to be the target of the attacks must have charged this phase. If the unmodified hit roll for any of those attacks is 1-5, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: An Eye for Weakness
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** units that target that enemy unit.

heroicTraits.name: Ruthless Oversser
heroicTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **GRAND FORGEHOST** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

heroicTraits.name: Raging Animus
heroicTraits.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

other.name: Dirge of Desolation
other.declare: Pick the **Ashen Elder** in this Regiment of Renown to chant this prayer, pick a terrain feature on the battlefield to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
other.effect: Roll a D3 for each enemy unit contesting the target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll. If the chanting roll was 12+, you can pick another terrain feature to be a second target.

other.name: All-Consuming Search
other.declare: Pick the **Ashen Elder** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability. Then, pick an objective or **Place of Power** that they are contesting and that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this battle to be the target.
other.effect: Roll 6 dice. For each 5+, give this unit 1 ritual point.

other.name: Reinforce Daemonsteel
other.declare: Pick the **Daemonsmith** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect: Until the start of your next turn, ignore the first damage point allocated to each friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit in each phase while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

other.name: Display of Total Power
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
other.declare: If neither **WAR MACHINE** unit in this Regiment of Renown used any **SHOOT** abilities this turn, pick an enemy unit to be the target.
other.effect:
For the rest of the turn:
•  While that enemy unit is on the battlefield, the **WAR MACHINE** units in this Regiment of Renown can only pick that enemy unit to be the target of their shooting attacks.
•  Each of those **WAR MACHINE** units counts as if it had 3 **daemonic power points**.

The first time you use this ability, you can use it without any command points being spent.

battleTraits.name: Harness Daemonic Power
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Start of Your Turn
battleTraits.effect:
You must use this ability at the start of each of your turns. Remove all **daemonic power points** from each friendly unit. Then, gain 1 **daemonic power point** for each friendly **desolation token** on the battlefield.

Then, allocate your daemonic power points to friendly non-**HOBGROT HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** units. Each unit can have a maximum of 3 **daemonic power points**. Then, all unallocated **daemonic power points** are lost.

**Designer’s Note:** *Non*-**HOBGROT** *units have abilities that become more powerful depending on how many daemonic power points they have. We recommend using coloured dice to track the number of points each unit has.*

battleTraits.name: Reserves of Daemonic Power
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HOBGROT HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit that has no **daemonic power points** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
If the total number of **daemonic power points** that friendly units have is 3 or fewer, give 2 **daemonic power points** to the target.

If the total number of **daemonic power points** that friendly units have is more than 3, give 1 **daemonic power point** to the target.

battleTraits.name: Leave the Land in Ruin
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Start of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: Pick a terrain feature or objective that does not have a friendly **desolation token** and is contested by a friendly **HELSMITHS OF HASHUT** unit that is not in combat to be the target.

battleTraits.name: Rising Fire
battleTraits.effect:
The following cumulative effects apply to friendly **GRAND FORGEHOST** units in each battle round after the first.

**Battle Round 2:**
***Daemonic Weaponry:*** Those units’ weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)**.

**Battle Round 3:**
***Harnessed Sorcery:*** Add 1 to casting rolls and chanting rolls for those units.

**Battle Round 4:**
***Channelled Power:*** Attacks made by those units score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

**Battle Round 5:**
***Arcane Dominance:*** Add 1 to the power level of those units if they are a **WIZARD** or **PRIEST**.

battleTraits.name: Dread Ranks Unbroken
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO GRAND FORGEHOST INFANTRY** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up), wholly within 6" of the battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Let The Realms Tremble
battleTraits.effect: Add **X** to charge rolls for friendly **ZIGGURAT STAMPEDE** units, where **X** is the number of friendly **ZIGGURAT STAMPEDE** units that have already charged this phase.

battleTraits.name: 'Break Them, One and All...'
battleTraits.effect: Any number of friendly **ZIGGURAT STAMPEDE** units can use the ‘Power Through’ command in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Run Roughshod
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **ZIGGURAT STAMPEDE** unit in combat to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

•  The target can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.
•  No mortal damage is inflicted on the target by **RETREAT** abilities.
